alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Amherst; Bath; Bedford; Botetourt; Craig; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:15PM EST until February 13 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...A wintry mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain. Snow and sleet amounts an inch or less. A light glaze of ice, but up to a tenth of an inch possible along the Blue Ridge and Alleghanys. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, southwest and west central Virginia and southeast West Virginia. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some uncertainty exists regarding the expected temperatures. A small change could impact amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The public is encouraged to report snowfall amounts...ice accumulation or wind damage to the National Weather Service via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov...through Facebook or Twitter...or by calling 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Pictures are greatly appreciated. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Alleghany; Amherst; Bath; Bedford; Botetourt; Craig; Rockbridge
